constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 65 (Thursday, April 15, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SMITH of Washington:
H.R. 2603.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The constitutional authority. on which this bill rests is
the power of Congress to ``provide for the common defense,''
as enumerated in Article I, Section of United States
Constitution.
[Page H1844]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

title: To establish the policy of the United States regarding the no-first-use of nuclear weapons.
